node.title: Findr
node.description: A Tinder-like web app but for things to do nearby using the Foursquare API.

node.title: Isolation Run
node.description: Use your phone's accelerometer to only play a video whilst you're running.

node.title: Pub Name Generator
node.description: Generates random pub names using a local words list

node.title: Github Issue Comments Component
node.description: A React component that uses a Github issue as a no-backend comment system for blogs.
